settings.title: Promotional offers
settings.text: Bester Caviar provides first-class caviar with up to 67% off the price. Still, we preserve the top quality of our product and ensure that it gets fresh to your table thanks to overnight shipping and special packaging. We also offer a discount for our first-time clients, so you can easily try our caviar. Feel free to contact our manager if you have any questions, we would love to help you pick the right product and buy caviar online.
settings.bottom_title: From caviar lover to the highest quality caviar brand in the US
settings.bottom_text: Bester Caviar, founded by the enterprising Inna Polutska, is a business with a remarkable story. Inna's journey began seven years ago when she moved from Ukraine to the US, as she embarked on a mission â€” to bring the taste of traditional sturgeon caviar, a cherished memory from her childhood, to the American market.
settings.bottom_second_text: Thanks to Inna's dedication to quality and accessibility, Bester Caviar has rapidly earned recognition in the culinary world, supplying some of the finest restaurants in Miami, including Casa Tua Cucina, Casa Tua Restaurant, Villa Azur, Marion Miami, W South Beach, Zuma, Alloy Bistro Gourmet, 1 Hotel South Beach, Cantina La Veinte, and other notable establishments.

settings.title: best Caviar Gift Sets
settings.sub_title: Each Caviar gift set comes with a mini cooler, set of blinis, mother of pearl spoons.

settings.title: About Us
settings.label: CAVIAR PRODUCTION
settings.text: Bester Caviar is owned by a young woman entrepreneur - Inna Polutska. She immigrated from Ukraine 7 years ago and now offers traditional sturgeon caviar to the American market, just like she used to have in her childhood.Backthen caviar in her country was more affordable, so it was widely used not only for great taste but for health benefits as well.Now Besterâ€™s founder is sourcing and bringing the same traditional and very delicious black caviar at a ...

settings.title: Free Overnight Delivery
settings.text: Free Overnight Shipping in temperature controlled coolers for perishable goods Monday through Thursday & Same Day Free Delivery in Miami 24/7.

settings.title: Personalize your order with a Gift Card
settings.text: Send someone special Bester Caviar Gift Card so they can receive their fresh caviar when they are ready to indulge.

settings.title: 24/7 Customer Service
settings.text: Contact our caviar concierge to help you with your customized selection & delivery details: +1(813)510-9892 inna@besterusa.com

settings.title: Amazonâ€™s Choice
settings.text: Bester Caviar is best selling caviar brand on Amazon with over 500 positive customer reviews and Amazonâ€™s Choice award: highly rated & well priced, ready to ship immediately.

settings.title: More and more quality service for our customers
settings.text: We work hard to make the caviar experience an exciting, satisfying event for you and your loved ones. Order caviar from us and enjoy the marvelous taste of top-class roes!

settings.question: What's the best place to buy caviar online?
settings.answer: Bester Caviar, a top Amazon caviar seller, is one of the best online caviar stores. We source caviar from top-world fish farms, namely Karat in Israel, Giaveri in Italy, and Rova in Madagascar, where sturgeons live in the natural environment. We also use a special packaging system for overnight shipping, so you get the caviar fresh and ready to be served on your table.

settings.question: Where is your company's Head Office located?
settings.answer: We are the main distributor of caviar in Miami, which allows us to cooperate with local well-acclaimed restaurants. At the same time, we ship our products all over the United States. Place your order online, and we will deliver your desired jar to your doorstep overnight. We use a special packaging system that keeps the fish roe fresh and crisp during its travel.
